verses.name: Romans 11:19
verses.text: Thou wilt say then, The branches were broken off, that I might be graffed in.

verses.name: Romans 11:20
verses.text: Well; because of unbelief they were broken off, and thou standest by faith. Be not highminded, but fear:

verses.name: Romans 11:21
verses.text: For if God spared not the natural branches, take heed lest he also spare not thee.

verses.name: Romans 11:22
verses.text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God: on them which fell, severity; but toward thee, goodness, if thou continue in his goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.
